short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lyrics for every song on YouTube

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Lyricity is designed for music lovers who want to immerse themselves in every song they hear on YouTube. With a sleek side panel interface, Lyricity effortlessly loads lyrics alongside your favorite music videos, allowing you to sing along or appreciate the artistry of each song without losing focus.

Whether you're discovering new tracks or revisiting classics, Lyricity enhances your listening experience by providing instant access to song lyrics, making it the perfect companion for every music session. Say goodbye to searching for lyrics elsewhereâ€”Lyricity brings them right to your browser, letting you dive deeper into the music you love!
